attributes.action: Stop the goverment spending are money abroad
attributes.additional_details: We the working public want the goverment to stop sending money to help other countries to help the people who are struggling in this country like are old people are so scared to put there heating on because if they do they won't be able to eat the served and worked  all there lives to be treated so bad by the people who are sapose to be taking care of them you are making us work for longer in are lives pls have some compassion and look after ur voters and ur mums ur dads ur gran and granddad stop thinking more of people from other countries
